author: Si_Daniels

comments.content: They forgot his sex life too.

_They forgot his sex life too._

'Cause that has _everything_ to do with making typefaces, right? ;-)

Well, if you are interested in _that_, I recommend Mr Holland's documentary [Looking for Mr Gill](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804032110/http:/averyenglishvillage.com/) which features elderly ladies talking about exactly that.

_They forgot his sex life too._

Not entirely Mike, you missed the calligraphic hard-on: "... the first time I saw him [Edward Johnston] writing, and saw the writing that came as he wrote, I had that thrill and tremble of the heart which otherwise I can only remember having had when first I touched her body..."

_They forgot his sex life too_

Yeah, that's been disappointingly missing from the entire "Creative Characters" series!
